name.en: Bandiva Duo the Elegy of the Wailing Winds
name.ja: <ruby>風<rt>ふう</rt></ruby><ruby>奏<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>調<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>苛<rt>か</rt></ruby>のバンディーヴァ・<ruby>Ｄ<rt>デュオ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Send 1 other card from your hand or field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card gains ATK equal to [the total number of cards in your opponent's hand and on their field] x 300 until the end of this turn. Then, if you have a Normal Monster in your Graveyard, you can destroy 1 card on your opponent's field.

materials.en: 2 Level 7 WIND Attribute Psychic Type monsters
